    • Constructor Detail

      • GameMap

        public GameMap(java.lang.String layoutFilename,
               java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,processing.core.PImage> brickwallSprites,
               processing.core.PImage stoneTileSprite,
               processing.core.PImage exitTileSprite,
               java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,processing.core.PImage> gremlinSprites,
               java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,processing.core.PImage> wizardSprites,
               processing.core.PImage fireballSprite,
               processing.core.PImage slimeSprite,
               processing.core.PImage powerupSprite,
               processing.core.PImage portalSprite,
               int lives,
               float wizardCooldown,
               float gremlinCooldown)
        Constructor method for a GameMap
        Parameters:
        layoutFilename - filename of text file containing layout of map
        brickwallSprites - images of BrickTile
        stoneTileSprite - image of StoneTile
        exitTileSprite - image of ExitTile
        gremlinSprites - images of Gremlin
        wizardSprites - images of Wizard, for all directions
        fireballSprite - image of wizard's fireball
        slimeSprite - image of gremlin's Slime
        powerupSprite - image of Powerup
        portalSprite - image of portal
        lives - current wizard lives remaining
        wizardCooldown - cooldown period for wizard to shoot fireballs
        gremlinCooldown - cooldown period for gremlin to shoot slimes

    • Method Detail

      • parseLayoutFile

        public boolean parseLayoutFile()
        Parses the layout text file for the GameMap, and add lines from file to a list. Handles errors with invalid files.
        Returns:
        true if file can be found and is properly parsed

      • createObjects

        public void createObjects()
        Creates objects of map according to list of text from layout file. Type of object is decided by current chracter in the list of text. Handles illegal chracters in layout file.

      • tick

        public void tick()
        Checks if exit door is reached by wizard

      • draw

        public void draw(processing.core.PApplet app)
        Draws the entire GameMap onto the window, including all the GameObjects. Updates status of all GameObjects before drawing.
        Parameters:
        app - PApplet app to draw on
